name: Not Nice Knight
description:
Made for Ludum Dare 32

A game made completely by me in 48hrs, you are a knight, you are in a dungeon without anything but a book containing biographies of all the monsters you will meet before you leave. Use your wit, and nastiness to make each one cry and you may see the light of day again.

Link to Ludum Dare voting page: http://ludumdare.com/compo/ludum-dare-32/?action=preview&uid=49589

Made with twine 2.0

Questions etc.: NebulaicToaster[at]gmail.com
